sentences.sentence: Caitlin's parents opted to educate her intensively at home.

sentences.sentence: They opted to put an executive committee in charge of the project rather than a single person.
sentences.translation: 他们选择由一个执行委员会而非个人来负责这个项目。

sentences.sentence: She was co-opted onto the board.
